channel.title: Posts on Halfyak - half code, half talk
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Halfyak - half code, half talk

item.title: The Fashion Theory of Code
item.description: An exploration of an analogy between code and fashion, presenting the idea that thinking about code in context is like thinking about fashion in context.

item.title: What is zero to the power of zero?
item.description: A school level maths discussion of the mathematical background needed to give a precise meaning to “zero to the power of zero”.
